actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide civilian employees of the National Guard certain rights of members of the competitive service.

summary.text: Makes National Guard civilian technicians members of the competitive service. Gives such individuals certain rights relating to order of retention and procedures for removal or suspension from employment.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide civilian employees of the National Guard certain rights of members of the competitive service.
